title: Samsung CES 2020 keynote in under 6 minutes
description: Samsungs CES 2020 press conference featured robots, exoskeletons, AI, augmented reality, smart cities, and basically every other technology category you could think of. The star of the show was the robotic sphere Ballie. Samsung also showed off an augmented reality demo featuring its new GEMS exoskeleton and AR glasses.
